entities.name: black

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a person who believes Black's story at first, but then changes his mind after seeing the Marauder's map.

entities.name: pettigrew

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is Ron's pet rat, which is revealed to be Pettigrew in disguise.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is holding Scabbers, and he agrees with Harry that Black and Lupin are out of their minds.

relationships.description: Harry disagrees with Black's story about Pettigrew's death.
